data.detailedDescription:
Real Life Cam! Just face it: you are a creepy old man. Why else would you be interested in spying on other people on reallifecam.com?

And, no, I don’t mean enlist the services of an escort. I mean some real psychiatric help. You got some serious fucking problems, man.

But, alas, there are sites out there to help you achieve your orgasm through watching strangers go about their daily activities. This, of course, should come as no surprise. The internet is a dark and depraved place, perfect for a degenerate like you to revel in your creepiest desires, cum on your oversized stomach, finish a bag of Cheetos (without washing your hands, of course), and then fall asleep in your computer chair. Rejoice!

Do I think you’re disgusting? Yes, I do. But am I going to help you? Yes, I will. Like I said before, I guess it’s nominally better for you to be fulfilling your desires, however gross they may be, on the internet as opposed to in real life. So, for that reason, I will help you navigate your creepy fucking voyeur sites. In good faith, of course, that you do not go out and act on these desires. That is my one stipulation. What do you say, do we have a deal?

Plenty of Cameras, For a Price

At any rate, Real Life Cam is far from free. Sure, you can kind of get an idea for how the site works and whether or not you’d be interested in paying for it, but you get a very limited preview time before your IP address gets logged for exceeding the maximum number of free streams. Once that happens, you’re going to have to pay something to get your fucked-up fix.

At the top of the site, Real Life Cam describes what they offer and what you can expect to pay. “25 apartments, 320+ cameras,” it reads, “from $33 per month.” Holy hell, that is a pretty penny to pay for a site that doesn’t really cost anything to produce content (outside of the cameras themselves, but that can’t be too expensive, and it’s a one-time cost).

Or maybe you’re just paying that much because the people at Real Life Cam knows that you are depraved and desperate and that there aren’t many other options, there aren’t many similar sites; they know you will pay a steeper price because you have no choice. Being a creepy stalker ain’t cheap, is it?

Great Site Design and User Interface

In addition to these features, you can also customize your viewing experience. Choose between single-stream mode, single-stream widescreen, 2-view mode, 4-view mode, auto-follow mode (within room), and auto-follow mode (entire apartment). You can also replay footage (in case you had to miss anything due to, I don’t know, sleep or something) of your subject from the last 24 hours. Most of these customizable features, however, are only available with a premium membership.

With that membership, though, not only will you gain access to exclusive apartments and cameras, but you also be able to replay any material recorded at any of the places over the last 24 hours. That way, if the streams that you are checking out become a little slow-moving, feel free to skip straight to the good stuff. Real Life Cam is a stalker pervert’s wonderland.

Not only do you have unfettered access to all cameras and recorded content from 25 different apartments with a premium membership, you also have the ability to control the site from your smartphone with Real Life Cam’s remote control feature. Why miss a single blink of whatever poor girl you’ve become obsessed with if you don’t need to, right? Right…

You creepy fucks will also probably be happy to learn that Real Life Cam has zero advertisements. Even in the free preview version. I’m sure I don’t need to tell you how rare this is for a porn site. But, hey, at $33 per month (with a six-month minimum commitment required upfront), I can’t imagine Real Life Cam is in dire need for ad revenue or anything.

Great Voyeur Site, But You Get What You Pay For

Actually, probably not. Still too weird for my taste. But, hey, as long as nobody’s getting harmed or deceived or taken advantage of, man, whatever floats your boat or strokes your scrote is fine by me. Fap on, gentlemen.

All in all, this site (often misspelled as "reallifecams") is really well done. Is it worth $33 per month? Well, I don’t know … I suppose it could be if this is something you’re really obsessed with. The video quality is great, audio quality isn’t awful, there are tons of features for you to enjoy 24 hours of the day, seven days a week. If you’re a voyeur freak, I would definitely recommend trying it out.

data.detailedDescription:
Voyeur House! Congratulations, pervert. Every single one of your dreams just came true, and I’m about to show you where you can reap the rewards. You can thank me later. Cash only, please.

Ever since you first hit puberty you started to rub your tiny two-inch baby dick to thoughts of spying on girls. Watching them get undressed for the night, watching them masturbate and have sex, even watching them shower. The thought of unrestricted access to a girl’s most intimate moments has been your life-long dream ever since.

Thanks to the wonders of the internet and the good people at Voyeur House, this dream is now a reality. Voyeur House has built something wonderful. They’ve set up a collection of webcams in the houses of some incredibly attractive people, so you can watch their highlights and lowlights as much as you want. You can watch them cook, clean, sleep, eat, shower, fuck—anything they do inside those four walls, you can watch. If you’re dedicated and desperate enough, you could probably even jerk off to all of it.

Yes, dreams really do come true. Wait, no. You’ve still got a two-inch dick, so maybe not every one of your dreams came true. Some things are too good to be true, I guess. Thankfully, Voyeur House isn’t one of them.

A Buffet Of Voyeurism

Let’s get the biggest downside of Voyeur House out of the way—it’s a whole lot of nothing most of the time. You might watch for a few minutes and not see anything interesting. The downside of 24/7 footage is that people can’t handle getting fucked for twenty-four hours a day. Maybe if we tied them down and roleplay forced them, but that’s a different site. On Voyeur House, we have to be patient.

But that’s not to say the site sucks—when nudity and sex does happen, it’s some of the hottest shit you’ll ever see. Soon enough, your patience will be rewarded. Not only does the waiting build anticipation, but the camera angles really magnify the creepy pervert effect. It all feels really forbidden and taboo, and we all know that blowing your load to something you’re not supposed to is twice as good. It feels like committing a crime, but the cops won’t bust down your door after.

Plus, if you do get really bored, you can always just swap houses. Chances are that at least one of them has something interesting going on, so just move around until your heart and your cock are content with what you find. If that’s not enough, there are highlight videos you can watch—this kills some of the joys of waiting around for something hot to happen, but it’s a good way to get your rocks off if you don’t have an entire evening to spare.

Two Ways To Pay

Even worse than being restricted to a single camera is the amount of fucking pop-ups advertising their premium plan that you’ll get. Jesus fucking Christ, you guys don’t have to remind me that I’m moments away from a REAL LIFE CAMS experience every ten seconds just because I’m not paying you. Even if all I wanted to do was watch this one girl’s kitchen twenty-four-seven, I’d pay for premium just to get rid of this annoying fucking ad.

Premium access opens up access to the rest of the houses, as well as to the good locations in the house. For thirty bucks a month (or slightly less if you prepay over a longer-term), you’ll get to choose who you watch and where you watch them. No longer restricted to the most boring rooms, you can follow the action to the bedroom or the bathroom, a.k.a where the good stuff happens. Voyeur House lets you watch a few single women, as well as a straight couple and a lesbian couple, so perverts of all inclinations should be able to find something hot to watch with premium access. If it happens inside the confines of the home, you’ll be able to watch it if you’re patient enough.

On top of the membership rate, there’s a type of currency that Voyeur House uses (and charges you for). You get about one token per day as a bonus with your membership, but you’ll have to pay extra if you want more.

And what do these tokens do? They’ve got three uses. The first, which is actually fucking fantastic, is that they give you access to replays of some of the hottest stuff that has ever happened over the last twenty-four hours on Voyeur House. Say you’re into this one girl that you’ve been spying on, but you’ve been watching for eight hours and all she’s done is laze around the house and cook dinner. You think she’s cute and you’re basically in love. But while you were waiting for her to show a bit of cleavage some other girl was busy creaming all over her boyfriend’s gigantic cock. Just venture over to the replay section, spend a token, and enjoy yourself. Fall in love with her instead, at least you know she puts out.

You can also use them to watch a sort of greatest-hits selection of videos: these aren’t necessarily from the last day, but Voyeur House picks out some of the hottest sucking and fucking action and locks it behind this secondary paywall for you to enjoy. It kind of sucks that you’re having to pay for something you could have seen if you were watching at the time, but these videos are usually pretty fantastic so it can be worth it if you want to see some really nice content.

The other use of tokens is kind of sad for people who aren’t losers, but you might like it. You can tip tokens directly to the models, for no reason other than the fact that you’re a nice guy with a delusional fantasy that this might lead to them falling in love with you, abandoning their career, settling down with you, getting married and having two youngsters and a house with a white picket fence and a pool… and all of that other utter bullshit. If that sounded appealing to you instead of disgusting and desperate, tip away.

Insert Tokens To Chat

But, I suppose if you’re lonely and desperate enough, it’s a reasonable facsimile of the actual human contact that your life so sorely lacks. You can use the sex scenes to fill the gaping hole in your sex life, and the conversation to fill the gaping hole in your social life. Voyeur House really does have it all.

data.detailedDescription:
Luuv’s got kind of a funny title for a porn site, or really any type of website or brand. It’s not an acronym, not unless there’s something lost in translation from the site’s Czech origins, but it somehow feels like those letters stand for the joint’s motto: The Life of Other People. That short string of words probably conjures filthier pictures in your head than the name alone, as any good smut offers a glimpse into somebody else’s intimacy. This ain’t your typical adult platform, though, so the voyeuristic thrills actually run deeper here than they do on your average Brazzers knockoff.

How would you like to peek into a house or apartment full of sexy women, their potential partners and all the X-rated tomfoolery that ensues? That’s the gimmick behind Luuv.com, a 24-7 livestreaming voyeur site where you can indulge your perviest peeping tom fantasies. They’re the first new site I’ve seen in this underserved niche in a while, so I couldn’t wait to see who they’d gotten to sign up and just what they were doing on camera. Read on and I’ll tell you what I found, or you can just hit the link to go scope it out with your very own peepers.

Have a Peep, My Fellow Toms

If you’re familiar with voyeur cam sites, you’ll recognize what you’re looking at right away. These ain’t the usual screencaps of sex acts you find on most premium porn sites, though you’ll see some fucking and sucking as you scroll through the spread. You’ll also see a fair number of empty rooms, or rooms with people just doing daily SFW bullshit. Luuv.com has a ton of live cams in a ton of rooms, letting you peer in on living rooms, balconies, kitchens, bathrooms, and of course, bedrooms. They’ve currently got five apartments wired up for watching, and they’re actively looking for new participants who like to share their lives—even the sexy parts.

There’s a certain thrill to peeping even when the gals ain’t doing anything in particular, though it’d be a hard sell for a premium site. The webmasters ain’t morons, so they understand this, and have planned accordingly by hiring promiscuous chicks. Members will witness plenty of fucking, sucking, and other perversion. I love how so many of these chicks lounge around naked or wearing very little, and I love it even more when they’re getting nasty. I’ll touch on this more later, but it goes well beyond the vanilla sex your parents are into.

There are some free previews, including free voyeur cams, but it’s pretty limited. I peered in on an empty room and got a message saying, “Something’s happening in the other room!” Instead of a link to the room they were talking about, I got a link to the signup page. If you’re a premium porn consumer or voyeur cam fan, you know how it goes.

Cheap Trials and Interactive Perks

I should warn you, though, that Luuv.com memberships are a bit pricier than your typical premium porn subscription. Most adult video brands, my own MissAVDHCasting included, are charging thirty bucks a month. It’s a buck under forty here, with yearly rates that break down to half that. Keep in mind, they’ve got to keep their models on the payroll 24-7 instead of just hiring them for a one-off. Anyway, every fetishist has learned by now that it costs more to indulge a kink than a human-standard love of general fucking. Voyeur cams are still something of a rarity, and you’ll pay accordingly.

If you’re new to the format, it’s worth mentioning that you don’t have to limit yourself to just being a silent observer. You can tip your favorite models, comment, and even put in requests. Models ain’t obligated to respond in any way or do what you’re asking, but as a lot of us perverts have learned, money talks. It’s similar to webcam sites like Chaturbate in this respect, only the cameras never turn off.

The very first thing I did when I got signed up was peek in on one of those Premium-only voyeur cams. It’s camera 6 in Emily and Damon’s bedroom, and Emily is lying naked as I type this up. I wonder what she’s looking at as she scrolls on her phone, her juicy, tatted body looking absolutely mouthwatering. Even though I know she’s aware of the camera, she doesn’t know I’m watching, which is so weirdly sexy to me.

Missed a Live Fuck Sesh? No Worries!

Most of us can’t stare at a voyeur site all day, flipping through the cameras like a Wal-Mart loss prevention specialist with a raging hard boner. For the rest of us internet slackers, Luuv has some fantastic archives. I don’t know if they’re automated or curated, but you don’t have to go digging to find the sexiest clips.

After getting all hard and drippy just gawking at Emily’s naked body, I scrolled down to her archive section and found some great videos of full-on fucking. The angles ain’t exactly pro porno, so it’s like watching on security cam, but that’s part of the thrill of a site like this.

Tagging is very well implemented here, and the full Archives view includes a row of keywords for instant access to prerecorded showers, oral sex scenes, masturbation, ass eating and anal. They’ve got all the major pornographic bases covered, from doggystyle to facials, and even kinkier play like threesome and BDSM suspension. Some of the categories are currently empty, but it’s still a new site; those unfilled genres are a great sign of what’s to come.

Lounging Naked and Looking Great

Luuv.com might be the newest of these voyeur cam platforms, but you can already tell from the strength of the archive that they’re going to be a real contender for king of the niche. I’m not sure where they’re finding these babes or these couples, but the site offers steady vicarious thrills for the peepers, the toms and the gawkers in the audience. This one has a high potential for growth, too, especially since they’re actively looking for more participants to give us a peephole into their lives. Previews are fairly scant, with all the best stuff locked up, but you will get a solid sense for what’s available to members before you pull the trigger.

There are a few professionals that slip through the cracks but only during their downtime. There’s no studio pushing a bigger directed agenda here, as far as I can tell. It’s all very bare and wild. You must have seen this website listed under my other reviews for the other types of content that it serves. However, today, we’ll be honing in on the voyeur cams, not just because I’m trying to appeal to people who like peeking in on other people when they’re getting freaky, but also because the voyeur cams on CamSoda are, well, really fucking strange.

I’ve also seen shit that shouldn’t have been made, and I will not elaborate on that. You know what I’m talking about. Some people do things they shouldn’t. Anyways, moving on from that, let’s just say that CamSoda’s voyeur cams take shit to the next level, and I’m not exactly sure that’s a good thing. They Show Everything

These cams feature actual human women living their lives in real-time, meaning they don’t do anything interesting. First of all, most of the cams that I see on here under the live section don’t feature any people. They are just cameras planted in women’s homes, and they just sit there, streaming a still frame of an empty room. Seriously, it’s fucking creepy. They’re all nighttime streams, too. You’re looking at nighttime streams at any given point in time, so I’m guessing this content is coming in from across the globe. Maybe they’re going out of their way to target nighttime streams, or perhaps it’s just a coincidence, but I do not see many sunny days here. Most of the shit is in black and white because the cameras have night-vision.

So this entire goddamn section is just filled to the brim with live streams of empty rooms, in real-time, with night-vision, in black and white. If you could take the temperature of this section of the website, it would read dead cold. Not even I can rub one out to this kind of non-content. But I think I know what the problem is. I’m not a natural voyeur. I don’t enjoy not being part of the action. I’m a hands-on kind of guy, that is, I like to have my hands on women, and I want their hands on my cock, or rubbing their tits or something. I’m not the kind of guy to hide in any bushes looking at other people having sex. It’s just not my kink.

For Real Voyeurs Only

That’s what allows these streams to become more organic versions of the voyeur genre that’s already going pretty strong. You’re getting an actual sneak peek into the lives of real women without breaking the law. Now, that does come with downsides. The average woman doesn’t exactly walk around with a dildo in her ass. Most of the time, they just sort of lounge around on their phones or eat their lunch or something. That’s what I’m seeing on CamSoda’s voyeur section, at least. That being said, if the very idea of being sneaky and seeing something you shouldn’t arouses you, then you should feel right at home here. Hell, if you’ve got a multi-monitor setup, as I do, you could spread several of these live streams across several screens and watch them all while you edge yourself for hours.

What I know for a fact is that there is an entire treasure trove of voyeur-themed streams on here for you guys to enjoy. You can sign up on the site if you’d like, and that allows you to deposit for the credits mentioned above, or you could just skip the whole ordeal and watch the streams for free. No one will judge you. However, I believe that some of these streams go into private mode when there’s action on screen, like if someone actually decides to fuck.

All in all, I’m lukewarm on this section of CamSoda. I’ve enjoyed their other sections a lot more, to be honest. I understand that voyeur cams aren’t supposed to be nearly as eventful as other genres, and it could just be my personal preference getting in the way, but I don’t consider this shit too hot.
